title: Your Child's 30th Birthday
completion_message: Great job! Write down your reflections. Come back to these values whenever you need a reminder of why you are here.

title: Morning Glory Time
completion_message: Good job! Put down some time every day on your calendar to come here to practice. Set up some reminders. Commit and stick to the plan. You can do this!

title: Body Scan
completion_message: Did you notice any discomfort or tension? Pay attention to that today and see what you discover.

title: Journal
completion_message: Congrats on writing a journaling activity today! Check out the workbook for tips to help you succeed!

title: What is mindfulness?
completion_message: Mindfulness is not what we think. It is simple but not easy: paying attention to the present moment nonjudgmentally, with intention.

title: Body Scan
completion_message: Did you notice any discomfort or tension? Pay attention to the sensations throughout today.

title: Journaling Activity
completion_message: Congrats on earning today’s pedal! You also unlocked two bonus activities! Give them a try and build your mindfulness muscles.
